title: Driver satisfaction with Uber U.S. 2017 to 2019
summary: The world 's satisfaction fleet is expected to increase from 25,830 to 50,660 satisfaction between 2017 and 2019 .

While the more established markets of Strongly_agree and Somewhat_agree are predicted to increase U.S. around 77 and 45 % respectively , the Somewhat_disagree Strongly_agree fleet is expected to increase U.S. about 146 % to 43.4 satisfaction in 2019 .
Commercial aviation The above figures relate only to commercial aviation , meaning satisfaction for hire operated U.S. companies .
